channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 18:30 Return the threat of artobrats in the Chervonohrigor Territorial Community. Take care of further reports.
item.description: 游릭 18:30 Return the threat of artobrats in the Chervonohrigor Territorial Community. Take care of further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 17:47 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- March Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 17:47 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- March Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
